Class ConversationController

java.lang.Object
com.acfjj.app.controller.AbstractController
com.acfjj.app.controller.ConversationController
@RestController @CrossOrigin(origins="${angular.app.url}") @Scope("singleton") @RequestMapping("/conversation") public class ConversationController extends AbstractController
